author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for existing research on municipal benchmarks or industry standards relating to sales tax revenue collection.  Specifically, is there an ideal revenue collection recovery ratio for municipalities?  Any information would be so greatly appreciated.
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Sales Tax Revenue Collection Standards
